BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE piscom_id_entry_trn SET STR_LOST_FLAG_STATUS=? where STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER=? and STR_LOST_FLAG_STATUS=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISCOM_LOST_ICARD_TRN SET DT_LOST_DATE=?,DT_COMPLAIN_DATE=?,STR_FIR_NO=?,DT_FIR_DATE=?,STR_POLICE_STATION=?,STR_PLACE_WHERE_LOST=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCOM_LOST_ICARD_TRN a SET a.gnum_isvalid=0 WHERE a.str_id_card_number=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE piscom_id_entry_trn SET STR_LOST_FLAG_STATUS=? where STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and STR_LOST_FLAG_STATUS=?
